alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Choctaw; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Monroe; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:56PM CDT until June 16 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... Northern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Western Escambia County in south central Alabama... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 955 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Silas to 7 miles northeast of Chatom to 5 miles northeast of Jackson to 10 miles east of Whatley, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Citronelle, Chatom, McCullough, Saint Stephens, Wagarville, Leroy, Deer Park, Uriah, Whatley, Tibbie, Calvert, Mount Vernon, Millry, Fruitdale, McIntosh, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, Movico and Poarch Creek Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Choctaw; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Monroe; Washington
